main event: A round, silver object was observed in Portland, Oregon on July 30, 1955, for a duration of three minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as round and silver and made no sound., It appeared to be stationary and did not maneuver., The object disappeared over a hill after the observation., The sighting lasted for about three minutes., The object is suspected to be a balloon based on the report.
witness description: A housewife and a military personnel
